abstract: Credit Suisse‘s investment banking arm said it had hired Stephan Kiratsous as a managing director in its financial institutions group for the Americas, where he will be co-head of the insurance group. Mr. Kiratsous was previously head of insurance banking at HSBC Securities. He joins Credit Suisse along with two colleagues from HSBC, Jeff Lebovitz and Jeff Star, Credit Suisse said.
lead_paragraph: Credit Suisse‘s investment banking arm said it had hired Stephan Kiratsous as a managing director in its financial institutions group for the Americas, where he will be co-head of the insurance group. Mr. Kiratsous was previously head of insurance banking at HSBC Securities. He joins Credit Suisse along with two colleagues from HSBC, Jeff Lebovitz and Jeff Star, Credit Suisse said.

headline.main: Credit Suisse Hires Banker from HSBC
